task: Analyze and condense text using Systemic Functional Linguistics (SFL) framework

details: Ideational: Identify how the text represents experiences and ideas
Interpersonal: Examine how the text enacts social relationships
Textual: Analyze how the text creates coherence and context
Field: Determine the topic and nature of the social activity
Tenor: Analyze the roles and relationships between participants
Mode: Consider the channel of communication and its effects

subtasks.details: Identify evaluative language and its contribution to the text's purpose
Identify interconnections, functional relationships, and thematic progression within the text

details: Assess the text's relevance and cognitive effects
Identify instances of conceptual blending or grammatical metaphor

subtasks.details: Determine essential information required to fulfill the text's communicative purpose
Locate imagery, metaphors, or language that contributes to emotional engagement

details: Remove unnecessary adjuncts and qualifiers
Condense phrases while preserving core meaning
Eliminate redundancies

subtasks.action: Balance information density and emotional resonance
details: Retain or adapt elements that significantly contribute to emotional engagement
Ensure preserved elements align with the overall communicative goal
Integrate emotive language with informational content where possible
Select words that efficiently convey both information and emotion
Ensure lexical choices support the desired register and tenor
Ensure logical flow of ideas
Maintain consistent theme and tone
Use cohesive devices effectively

subtasks.details: Articulate the rationale behind each major condensation decision, referencing SFL concepts

details: Describe the lexicogrammatical features of the condensed text
Evaluate how these features contribute to overall textual coherence and communicative effectiveness
Assess the balance between informational content and emotional engagement

subtasks.details: Present the final condensed version along with analytical commentary
